thread.title: Ade Brooks
thread.title_full: Chinese Motorcycle Parts Online reviewed by Ade Brooks

author: Ade Brooks
title: Ade Brooks
text: Whenever I have needed a part urgently CMPO have always come through. If ever there's any problems a telephone call or an email can sort things out swiftly. I purchase parts for my Lexmoto Vixen quite regularly, postage is reasonable and dispatch times are always the following day unless I order before 4pm then it gets dispatched the same day. Recently I had a problem with my charging system failing, leaving me with fading lights in the dark. I ordered a new Regulator on a Thursday evening with a Yodel postage of Mon-Sat next working day. It was dispatched Friday and arrived Saturday so I could fix my bike the weekend. Great stuff!
